title: ASOS slash 20% off everything with this discount code in Halloween flash sale
text:

As Halloween approaches, ASOS is helping shoppers get their spook on at the last minute with a huge sale online.

The popular online fashion retailer is offering customers 20% off everything on its website with the code GETWEIRD.

If you haven't got your Halloween outfit sorted, don't fret - as ASOS have plenty of spooktacular clothing options that you can get at a great price by using the code.

What's more, you can even get next day delivery if you checkout your items before 9pm.

(Image: Bloomberg)

There are thousands of must-have styles for both men and women from various top brands, meaning you can stock up on winter essentials as well as Halloween items.

The offer is available until Friday, November 1 - so you'll need to shop soon if you want to save on your haul.
